title: Starliner Flight Day 2 Activities
summary: With Starliner Calypso docked to the International Space Station, flight test activities continue for the spacecraft, ground teams and crew on board. On June 7, one day after docking, Crew Flight Test (CFT) Commander Butch Wilmore and Pilot Suni Williams unloaded cargo, charged tablets and reviewed emergency procedures to prepare for the “safe haven” operational […]
